headline: Bank of America price target raised to $57 from $50 at Keefe Bruyette
summary: Keefe Bruyette raised the firm’s price target on Bank of America (BAC) to $57 from $50 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The U.S. bank stocks have had a strong run following better than expected earnings and, more importantly, the election results, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm believes there are “potential tangible outcomes” post-election to drive higher earnings, including investment banking, trading, market sensitive revenues such as custody and asset ma

headline: Bank of America price target raised to $50 from $44 at Piper Sandler
summary: Piper Sandler raised the firm’s price target on Bank of America (BAC) to $50 from $44 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The Midwest bank backdrop is “undoubtedly better” following last month’s U.S. elections, and Piper expects large bank mid-quarter updates to reflect this positive sentiment, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm says customer health “seems good and is fading as a concern” while the Q4 net interest margin environment is “very strong with good deposit d
